content: crossed bucket hat by tiffany roots materials red heart casual cot n bulky weight 4 oz/140 yd 2 balls in preppie i used just a teeny bit of the second j hook 6 00 mm stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends finished size 23 5 circumference pattern notes this pattern is worked in the round with no joining at the end of the row to make smaller work only to row 9 or 10 taking time to measure the circumference to your preference special stitch cross stitch skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in skipped single_crochet pattern top chain 4 slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook to form loop rrrroooowwww 1111 chain 1 8 single_crochet into loop for every row hereafter mark your first single_crochet with your stitch marker to keep track of your row rrrroooowwww 2222 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 16 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 3333 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 24 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 4444 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 32 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 5555 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 40 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 6666 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat around 40 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 7777 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat around 48 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 8888 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat around 56 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 9999 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet repeat around 64 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 11110000 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 64 single_crochet rrrroooowwww 11111111 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet repeat around 72 single_crochet side rrrroooowwww 11112222 working in back loop only single_crochet in each single_crochet around rrrroooowwwwssss 11113333 ---- 11115555 single_crochet in each single_crochet around rrrroooowwww 11116666 slip_stitch into first single_crochet of last row since you are working in a spiral it is the stitch where the stitch marker is currently chain 3 work cross stitch around you will have one extra single_crochet at end of row - chain 1 join with slip_stitch to chain 3 rrrroooowwwwssss 11117777----11118888 single_crochet in each single_crochet around rrrroooowwww 11119999 repeat row 16 rrrroooowwwwssss 22220000---- 22223333 single_crochet in each single_crochet around brim rrrroooowwww 22224444 working in front loops only 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around rrrroooowwwwssss 22225555 ---- 22229999 single_crochet in each single_crochet around finish off weave in ends and enjoy © 2006 tiffany roots www tiffcrochets com
